name: Rene' J.
review: I mixed the peanut sauce in with the noodles. I used fettuccine (1 lb) and made enough sauce for 8 servings. Delicious.

name: Marc
review: Loved it but uswd Thai Chiles and chile oil which turned the heat up a little too much for most of my family (i didnt mind). Will definitely make it again.

name: Brian
review:
Very good. One of the quicker/better meals I’ve made from the Yummly app.
I used 9.5 oz of Hakubaku ramen noodles, doubled the sauce and did not measure how many veggies I used. Will make again and again.

name: Coco Youssef
review: i love this recipe. easy and a lil diff than typicalnfried noodles
